Haylee Pierce (any pronouns) is currently pursuing a bachelor's degree in Computer Science at Allegheny College with  two minors: Writing and Psychology. They will graduate in May of 2025. Pierce tutors their fellow Allegheny students as a Technical Leader. They completed the [Computer Information Technology program](https://www.lenape.k12.pa.us/technical-majors/computer-information-technology) at Lenape Technical School in 2021. Pierce then worked as a intern in Lenape's IT Department until starting college that August. Explore this website to some of their work.
